colti:
Technical operations projects series ; no.
            TO 619

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would involve: (i)
            the reconstruction and the paving of the 60 km Abengourou -
            Agnibilekrou road including supervision of construction;
            (ii) preinvestment studies: (a) feasibility studies of about
            700 km of primary roads; (b) the detailed engineering of
            about 500 km of road sections identified as of high priority
            from the feasibility studies under (a) above.
